name: drupal/media_migration
description: Provides a Drupal 7 to 8 media migration.

suggest.drupal/entity_embed: Allows entities to be embedded using a text editor.
suggest.drupal/file_entity: Extends Drupal file entities to be fieldable and viewable.
suggest.drupal/linkit: Provides an easy interface for internal and external linking with wysiwyg editors.
suggest.drupal/media_migration_tools: Media Migration supporting module for Migrate Tools
